title: Incorrect natural aerosol data
description: The natural aerosol forcing for the model is incorrect every year between 16 November and 16 January because of a wrong time metadata of the natural aerosol data. As a result, the prescribed aerosol optical depth is greater (smaller) over the African continent north (south) of 10S by up to approx. 0.7 (0.3) compared with that which should be.
